description: This table contains the Implant Tray Component information for the Surgical Log (ORL).

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the component record

columns.name: TRAY_COMP_ORIG_NUM
columns.description: This item stores the original number of components of this inventory item type which were present in the tray.

columns.name: TRAY_COMP_SUP_KEY
columns.description: This item stores a key containing the unique tray number and inventory item.

columns.name: TRAY_COMP_ORM_ID
columns.description: The pointer to the implant row record for this tray component.
